alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 20 at 12:49AM EST until November 21 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 4 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lewis county. * WHEN...From 4 AM early this morning to 4 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4422 7543 4433 7568 4440 7591 4415 7638 4402 7640 4393 7636 4393 7618 4404 7577 4403 7568 4414 7547 TIME Y22M11D19T1800Z-Y22M11D20T0000Z COORD...4413 7559 4425 7548 4439 7581 4440 7591 4415 7638 4386 7637 4383 7629 4372 7622 4374 7606 4391 7573 TIME Y22M11D20T0000Z-Y22M11D20T0900Z COORD...4370 7541 4384 7553 4394 7603 4383 7629 4359 7625 4341 7667 4331 7588 4348 7581 4342 7550 4350 7536 TIME Y22M11D20T0900Z-Y22M11D20T1800Z COORD...4352 7536 4359 7564 4367 7623 4355 7625 4356 7643 4338 7677 4325 7640 4318 7587 4340 7586 4342 7550 TIME Y22M11D20T1800Z-Y22M11D21T0900Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
